title: Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023)) of the Road Traffic Act 1994 (No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 1994
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic Act 1994 

(Detention of Vehicles) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on the 27th day of March 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited road traffic act 1994 (detention vehicles) (amendment) regulation 2025 (2) regulation come operation 27th day march 2025

title: Traffic and Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023)) of the Road Traffic Act 1994 (No.
heading: 2. Regulation 6 of the Road Traffic Act 1994 (Detention of Vehicles)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 6 of the Road Traffic Act 1994 (Detention of Vehicles) 

Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 460 of 2011) is amended – 

(a) 

by the substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph (aa) 
(inserted by regulation 3 of the Road Traffic Act 1994 (Detention 
of Vehicles) (Amendment) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 537 of 
2018) – 

“(aa) 
in the case of a person to whom subparagraph (i), (ii), (iii) 
or (v) (inserted by section 11(c)(i)(III) of the Road Traffic and 
Roads Act 2023 (No. 16 of 2023)) of section 41(1)(a) of the Act 
of 1994 applies, he or she was, at the time when the vehicle was 
detained, the holder of a driving licence or learner permit 
licensing him or her to drive the vehicle,”, 

and 

(b) by inserting the following paragraph after paragraph (e): 

in the case of a vehicle referred to in section 41(1)(f) 
“(f) 
(inserted by section 11(c)(ii) of the Road Traffic and Roads Act 
2023) of the Act of 1994, that at the time it was detained, a test 
certificate in accordance with Directive 2014/45/EU of the 
European Parliament and of the Counsel of 3 April 20141 on 
periodic roadworthiness tests for motor vehicles and their trailers 
and repealing Directive 2009/40/EC was in force in respect of the 
vehicle.”. 

1 OJ No. L 127, 29.04.2014, p. 51 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [54] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 February, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 
Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [54]
